response.answer_text: Don't Overuse Adjectives and Adverbs. ... Avoid Writing Prose In the Passive Voice. ... Don't Use Weak Qualifiers. ... Avoid Unnecessary Words. ... State Things In the Positive. ... Prefer the Concrete to the Abstract. ... Prefer Simple Words to Fancy Ones. ... Rearrange Sentences for Strength.

So pay attention! Don't Overuse Adjectives and Adverbs. ... Avoid Writing Prose In the Passive Voice. ... Don't Use Weak Qualifiers. ... Avoid Unnecessary Words. ... State Things In the Positive. ... Prefer the Concrete to the Abstract. ... Prefer Simple Words to Fancy Ones. ... Rearrange Sentences for Strength.
